string.name: movePieceFromE2ToE4
string.comment:
movePieceFromE2ToE4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Skuif stuk van e2 na e4

string.name: moveKnightToC3
string.comment:
moveKnightToC3
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

string.name: readOutOpponentName
string.comment:
readOutOpponentName
Press a button on the keyboard to hear the opponent's name aloud. The feature is most useful for blind players.

resources.string: Indien bogenoemde notasie vir jou onbekend is, leer meer hier:

string.name: bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
string.comment:
bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
Only the Latin character 'o' works.

resources.string: Beide die letter \"o\" en die syfer \"0\" kan gebruik word vir rokeer
Indien dit wettig is om weerskante toe te rokeer, gebruik Enter vir die koningskant
Hoofletters is slegs belangrik indien daar dubbelsinnige situasies is met \'n loper en \'n b-pion
Vir vooraf-skuiwe, tik bloot die skuif voordat dit jou beurt is
